snippet: Monroe Capital said on Thursday that it would drop a lawsuit against a former employee, Warren Woo, signaling a quiet end to one of the stranger spats between a lender and one of its deal makers.
abstract: Monroe Capital said on Thursday that it would drop a lawsuit against a former employee, Warren Woo, signaling a quiet end to one of the stranger spats between a lender and one of its deal makers.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Monroe Capital Drops Lawsuit Against Fired Banker
